A word formed from a shoresh beginning w.text: A ה at the start of a word might be part of a word formed from a shoresh beginning with ה, such as the shoresh הלך, which produces nouns like הֲלִיכָה (
, the activity of walking), and verbs like הוֹלֵךְ (

The Hebrew version of the word \"the\" b.text: A ה at the start of a word might be the Hebrew version of the word "the", for example הַאֶבֶן, "the rock," formed from the word אֶבֶן, meaning "rock."
